Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop

This package provides all related classes to support generic drag and drop functionality within this system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataInTransit The DataInTransit is an interface to let the underline framework be aware that the data object, which implements this interface, is in transit status during cut or move function, so as , for example, to change its icon (if possible) to lighter color as visual indicator.
HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent This interface defines functionality that should be implemented in the class that would support drag function.
HL7SDKDropCompatibleComponent This interface defines functionality that should be implemented in the class that would support drop function.
 

Class Summary
DataTransferActionType

Design Rationale The TransferActionType is a Class that refers to the action, which may be performed during data transfer i.e., at moment of cut/copy/paste and drag/drop.
HL7SDKDragGestureAdapter This Adapter class implements java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener interface to provide support for initiation of Drag action.
HL7SDKDragSourceAdapter This Adapter class implements java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener interface to provide support for Drag action.
HL7SDKDropTargetAdapter This Adapter class implements java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener interface to provide support for Drop action.
TransferableNode This class is designated to handle data transfer and drag-n-drop, etc., for classes in caAdapter.
 

Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop Description

This package provides all related classes to support generic drag and drop functionality within this system. Each individual package may need to provide customized implementation of functions provided in this package.
